patterns.name: Gamma Squeeze
patterns.description: Market makers are forced to buy as price rises to hedge negative gamma, accelerating the move.

patterns.name: Institutional Accumulation
patterns.description: Smart money is building positions without moving the price significantly. Bullish breakout expected.

patterns.name: Short Covering Rally
patterns.description: Bears are trapped and exiting positions, creating explosive upward momentum.

patterns.name: Gamma Flip (Support)
patterns.description: Price at GEX flip level acting as strong support. Dealers buy the dip.

patterns.name: Long Unwinding
patterns.description: Bulls are giving up and exiting their positions. Market likely to drift lower.

patterns.name: Institutional Distribution
patterns.description: Smart money is offloading positions to retail at high prices. Major correction possible.

patterns.name: IV Crush (Expiry Special)
patterns.description: High IV at open expected to collapse. Best for non-directional selling.

patterns.name: Bear Trap
patterns.description: False breakdown of support followed by rapid recovery and OI red.

patterns.name: Delta Neutral Pinning
patterns.description: Large Straddle/Strangle OI at a specific strike, price likely to pin there for expiry.

patterns.name: Vomma Spike (Vol Expansion)
patterns.description: Rapid increase in Vega sensitivity. Volatility explosion imminent.

failure_scenarios.warning: Theta decay will accelerate; avoid buying out-of-the-money options.
Index is rising but 70% of stocks are falling. Weak rally, likely to fail.
